column1: Abertay prides itself on putting the student at the centre - from the brand new student centre to the exciting new accommodation planned for 2008. Our accommodation and facilities are second to none and the new accommodation has made proximity to the campus
column2: ensuite facilities and internet access its main priority. In fact there are many good reasons to choose Abertay.

column1: Abertay is an outstanding place to study
column2: our Schools are the heart of the University and our teaching staff are active in research and industry. The courses on offer are dynamic and exciting and are at the cutting edge of technology.

column1: International students make up 12% of our student body so you’ll have a great mix of friends from around the world. Why choose Abertay to study – simple
column2: we offer a highly rated education that gives you an international CV and represents a real investment in your future. Read more for international students in the International Guide.

column1: University life is vibrant and multi-cultural. The small city campus makes it ideal to wander through town
column2: meet lecturers for coffee and study in the award winning library with fellow students. There is lots to do within the university and Dundee so if cinema
column7: shops or sports is your thing welcome to the City of Discovery.

column1: Dundee really is a fantastic place to be a student. It’s affordable
column2: has a great public transport system
column3: is located in a beautiful part of Scotland and best of all is student friendly. Order our Prospectus and come see for yourself! We look forward to welcoming you to our University.
